1 pound ground pork,1 tablespoon soy-based liquid seasoning (such as Maggi® Jugo),½ teaspoon chipotle powder,1 clove garlic, minced,1 cup diced fresh pineapple,¼ cup minced red onion,1 small jalapeño pepper, seeded and minced,2 tablespoons minced fresh cilantro,½ lime, juiced,salt to taste,8 (6 inch) corn tortillas,,
